name: MEC Travel Light Organizer Pod - Unisex
description: Your travel luggage should make it easy to get away. If you agree, get ready for the Travel Light Organizer Pod. Made from streamlined nylon, it won’t add bulk to your bag. Toiletries, chargers, Clif Bars – what you choose to organize is up to you.Made of lightweight 70-denier ripstop nylon with a water-resistant coating.2 internal zippered mesh pockets for organization.Webbing carrying handle has a hook for easy hanging.
